settings.setting: Read up on the latest fundraisings on Site Name.

phrases.phrase: Deleting a category will delete all fundraisings that belong to that category.

Value is in characters, i.e.: 15 would show something like: "Lorem ipsum dol..."

How many minutes should a user wait before they can submit another fundraising?

You can add some special keyvars:
[title]: Campaign title
[fundraising_url]: Campaign URL
[full_name]: Full name of fundraising owner
[fundraising_goal]: Campaign goal
[short_description]: Campaign main description
[description]: Campaign short description
[start_time]: Campaign start date
[end_time]: Campaign end date
[total_sign]: Total signed
[signature_goal]: Signature goal
[target]: Target name
